item.title: Outside Online: Sweetgrass Productions
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Lifestyle segment for Outside Online. We sit down and talk to the Sweetgrass team about their upcoming film ‘Valhalla’ I completed editorial, graphics and final color grade.
item.content:encoded:
Lifestyle segment for Outside Online.

We sit down and talk to the Sweetgrass team about their upcoming film ‘Valhalla’

I completed editorial, graphics and final color grade.

item.title: Outside Online: Durango Dogs
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Sometime you need to take a break from the TV shows and flashy music videos. Here is a 3 part series I did for Outside Online about the bad-as dogs you’ll find in Durango, Colorado.
item.content:encoded: Sometime you need to take a break from the TV shows and flashy music videos. Here is a 3 part series I did for Outside Online about the bad-as dogs you’ll find in Durango, Colorado.

item.title: COSMOS: A Spacetime Odyssey
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Cosmos, the revamp of the Carl Sagan hit, is receiving praise!   I did all the Dailies Processing using Davinci Resolve and Media Composer for QC. The show was shot primarily on Alexa and RED. Half of the show was shot in New Mexico. The majority of that on the sound stage in Santa Fe. […]
item.content:encoded:
Cosmos, the revamp of the Carl Sagan hit, is receiving praise!

 

I did all the Dailies Processing using Davinci Resolve and Media Composer for QC. The show was shot primarily on Alexa and RED.

Half of the show was shot in New Mexico. The majority of that on the sound stage in Santa Fe. Neil deGrasse Tyson has posted some cool pictures of the shoot on his twitter feed:

item.title: ABC’s ‘Killer Women’
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Last fall I had the opportunity to work for DELUXE for the dailies processing of ABC’s ‘Killer Women’.   I used their ExD cart running Colorfront and QC in Media Composer.   The Deluxe team were awesome to work with, and the editorial staff for the show were an absolute pleasure! I look forward to […]
item.content:encoded:
Last fall I had the opportunity to work for DELUXE for the dailies processing of ABC’s ‘Killer Women’.

 

I used their ExD cart running Colorfront and QC in Media Composer.

 

The Deluxe team were awesome to work with, and the editorial staff for the show were an absolute pleasure! I look forward to working with all of them in the future!
